TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: Deadly matter in this site has been observed with consistency being pulled up by the <color=lightblue>Attlerock's</color> gravity as it orbits overhead.
CASSAVA: Behavior is consistent with observations; the deadly matter obeys gravity from both natural and artificial sources, and can be competitively manipulated by sources of gravity.

CASSAVA: To further test this hypothesis, I should travel to see if the deadly matter on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> is affected by <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern's</color> gravity as well.
CASSAVA: Once I can confirm this hypothesis.. I must proceed with the construction of the <color=orange>Inspired</color> in the time I have left.
